title: Criminology 101 W Criminal Lawyer Lauren Noriega

description:
TGC has Criminal Attorney Lauren Noriega, The LA based Attorney drops some valuable knowledge and insight so pay close attention. Show her some love on IG @nori_thenightmare For case quotes hit her up 213-703-0004 & tell her TGC sent you.
